About Robert Skelton

I am a Sr Infrastructure Architect at Wabtec based in Palm Bay, FL. I earned a BS in Computer Engineering from Auburn University in May 2015, and I’ll working towards a MS in Computer Science from Georgia Tech. My expertise is in automation with Chef, Terraform, and Gitlab CI, and with architecture in AWS.

My favorite topics are finance, technology, craft beer, college football, cars, and home renovations.
